content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
Hi! I like to read and play with my dog. I also like to go on walks.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love reading too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like historical fiction and mysteries.
I love historical fiction too! I just finished reading a book about the Tudors. It was really good.
I love the Tudors! I've read a few books about them too. I'm also a big fan of mysteries.
Me too! I love trying to figure out who the killer is.
Me too! It's so much fun.
What are some of your favorite mysteries?
I love the Agatha Christie books. I also like the Sherlock Holmes books.
Me too! I love Agatha Christie. I've read a lot of her books.
Me too! I love her writing style.
Me too! She's so good at creating suspense.
I know! I can't wait to read more of her books.
Me too! I think I'm going to go read one now.
Me too! I'm going to go read one too.
